title: Ocean Week Part 2. Mystery Gifting yourself?
body: How does one mystery gift themself stuff, part 2 of the ocean week has just finished, so the mystery gifting has become unlocked. So how does one do so.

replies.body:
It's in store now!

....I got Lollipoppy...might have to try again.

https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/photos/a.547200335437052.1073741828.546307902192962/562630977227321/?type=3
I first shot got Challenger Nidalee

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=nj3mWOq1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-25T05:09:38.741+0000)
>
> It's in store now!
> 
> ....I got Lollipoppy...might have to try again.
> 
> https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/photos/a.547200335437052.1073741828.546307902192962/562630977227321/?type=3

Lollipoppy is best Poppy

Well follow either one of these steps and you should get there:

1. You go to the League client shop.
2. You click on 'Skins' tab.
3. You find the option called 'Mystery Skin'
4. you pay the amount of RP.
5. Enjoy what ever skin you get.

OR

1. You go to the League client shop.
2. Click on the 'feature' tab. (which is the default one it takes you to so this is real easy)
3. Look for the 'whats new' section. (which is at the bottom)
4. Find 'Mystery skin'.
5. You pay the amount of RP.
6. Enjoy what ever skin you get.

or if your lucky riot may have added it to the main screen of the League client.
so with the ocean week mystery gift we still have to pay rp?{{champion:20}}

Blackfrost anivia on my first go!! :D

Many thanks riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Cheers for the help thanks guys.
